text.div:
Repeat Pattern

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
A Ante (before)added v2.4
BID twice a day at institution-specified times(e.g., 9AM-4PM)added v2.4
C service is provided continuously between start time and stop timeadded v2.4
D Cibus Diurnus (lunch)added v2.4
I Inter(e.g., between this meal and the next, between dinner and sleepadded v2.4
M Cibus Matutinus (breakfast)added v2.4
Meal Related Timings <timing>C ("cum")<meal>added v2.4
Once one time only.This is also the default when this component is null.added v2.4
P Post (after)added v2.4
PRN given as neededadded v2.4
PRNxxx where xxx is some frequency code(e.g., PRNQ6H); given as needed over the frequency period.added v2.4
Q<integer>D every <integer> daysadded v2.4
Q<integer>H every <integer> hoursadded v2.4
Q<integer>J<day#> repeats on a particular day of the week,From the French jour (day). If <integer> is missing, the repeat rate is assumed to be 1. Day numbers are counted from 1=Monday to 7=Sunday. So Q2J2 means every second Tuesday; Q1J6 means every Saturday.added v2.4
Q<integer>L every <integer> months (Lunar cycle)added v2.4
Q<integer>M every <integer> minutesadded v2.4
Q<integer>S every <integer> secondsadded v2.4
Q<integer>W every <integer> weeksadded v2.4
QAM in the morning at institution-specified timeadded v2.4
QHS every day before the hour of sleepadded v2.4
QID four times a day at institution-specified times(e.g., 9AM-11AM-4PM-9PM)added v2.4
QOD every other day(same as Q2D)added v2.4
QPM in the evening at institution-specified timeadded v2.4
QSHIFT during each of three eight-hour shifts at institution-specified timesadded v2.4
TID three times a day at institution-specified times(e.g., 9AM-4PM-9PM)added v2.4
U <spec> for future use, where <spec> is an interval specification as defined by the UNIX cron specification.added v2.4
V Cibus Vespertinus (dinner)added v2.4
xID "X" times per day at institution-specified times, where X is a numeral 5 or greater.(e.g., 5ID=five times per day; 8ID=8 times per day)added v2.4

name: v2.0335
title: v2 Repeat pattern
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0335 ( Repeat pattern)

concept.display: twice a day at institution-specified times

designation.value: twee maal per dag op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: service is provided continuously between start time and stop time

designation.value: service wordt continu geleverd tussen starttijd en stoptijd

extension.valueString: (e.g., between this meal and the next, between dinner and sleep
(bijv. tussen deze maaltijd en de volgende, tussen avondeten en slapen gaan)
This is also the default when this component is null.
Dit is ook de standaardwaarde als dit component leeg is.
(e.g., PRNQ6H); given as needed over the frequency period.
(bijv. PRNQ6H); gegeven indien nodig binnen de frequentieperiode

concept.display: where xxx is some frequency code

designation.value: waarbij xxx een of andere frequentiecode is

extension.valueString: From the French jour (day). If <integer> is missing, the repeat rate is assumed to be 1. Day numbers are counted from 1=Monday to 7=Sunday. So Q2J2 means every second Tuesday; Q1J6 means every Saturday.

Afkomstig van het Franse jour (dag). Als <integer> ontbreekt, wordt de herhaalfrequentie verondersteld 1 te zijn. Dagnummers worden geteld van 1=maandag tot 7=zondag. Dus Q2J2 betekent elke tweede dinsdag; Q1J6 betekent elke zaterdag.

concept.display: repeats on a particular day of the week,

designation.value: herhaalt op een bepaalde dag in de week.

concept.display: in the morning at institution-specified time

designation.value: in de morgen op vastgestelde tijd

concept.display: every day before the hour of sleep

designation.value: elke dag voor het slapen gaan

concept.display: four times a day at institution-specified times

designation.value: vier maal per dag op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: in the evening at institution-specified time

designation.value: in de avond op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: during each of three eight-hour shifts at institution-specified times

designation.value: tijdens elke van de drie achtuursdiensten op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: three times a day at institution-specified times

designation.value: drie maal per dag op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: for future use, where <spec> is an interval specification as defined by the UNIX cron specification.

designation.value: voor toekomstig gebruik, waarbij <spec> een intervalspecificatie is zoals gedefinieerd door de UNIX cron specificatie.

extension.valueString: (e.g., 5ID=five times per day; 8ID=8 times per day)
bijv. 5ID=vijf maal per dag; 8ID=acht maal per dag

concept.display: "X" times per day at institution-specified times, where X is a numeral 5 or greater.

designation.value: "X" maal per dag op vastgestelde tijden waarbij X een getal van 5 of hoger is.
